import React from 'react' import s from "./UsersItem/UsersItem.module.css"; import {UnFollowUserAC} from "../../Readux/Reducer-Users"; const Users = (props) => { return
{ props.Users.map(u=>
{u.followed ? : }
{u.name}
{u.location.country}
{u.message}
{u.location.city}
) }
} export default Users
